content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":263692,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad appeared."},{"lineNumber":263693,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle start."},{"lineNumber":263694,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t学者が撤退を決めて逃げる","translatedEnglishLine":"The scholar decided to retreat and fled."},{"lineNumber":263695,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t仲間を大切した戦いをする","translatedEnglishLine":"Fought while cherishing comrades."},{"lineNumber":263696,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad appeared."},{"lineNumber":263697,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが魔物を人質に卑怯作戦をする","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance uses monsters as hostages in a sneaky tactic."},{"lineNumber":263698,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle start."},{"lineNumber":263699,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊は撤退していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad retreats."},{"lineNumber":263700,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad appeared."},{"lineNumber":263701,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t新しく加わったアパッチがみんなと不仲","translatedEnglishLine":"Recently joined Apache is not on good terms with everyone."},{"lineNumber":263702,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが卑怯な毒煙作戦をする","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance executes a sneaky poisonous smoke tactic."},{"lineNumber":263703,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle start."},{"lineNumber":263704,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊は撤退していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad retreats."},{"lineNumber":263705,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t彼らの中に少し不協和音","translatedEnglishLine":"Some discord among them."},{"lineNumber":263706,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad appeared."},{"lineNumber":263707,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t剣豪、アパッチが裏切りランス側に付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Swordmaster Apache betrays and sides with Rance."},{"lineNumber":263708,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle start."},{"lineNumber":263709,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が撤退していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad retreats."},{"lineNumber":263710,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t剣豪、アパッチが復帰した","translatedEnglishLine":"Swordmaster Apache has rejoined."},{"lineNumber":263711,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad appeared."},{"lineNumber":263712,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘をしようとした時、地面が陥没して迷宮に遭難","translatedEnglishLine":"When about to fight, the ground caved in and they got lost in a labyrinth."},{"lineNumber":263713,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t一時休戦で一緒に行動","translatedEnglishLine":"Temporary ceasefire, moving together."},{"lineNumber":263714,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tハチ女の集団と遭遇、共闘となります","translatedEnglishLine":"Encountered a group of bee women; they form an alliance."},{"lineNumber":263715,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊と魔人討伐隊","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad and the demon extermination squad."},{"lineNumber":263716,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地上に戻れた、今日は戦わずに別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Returned to the surface, parted ways without fighting today."},{"lineNumber":263717,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマエリータ隊が現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad appeared."},{"lineNumber":263718,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそろそろ決着を付けたい全力でいく","translatedEnglishLine":"They want to settle it soon, going all out."},{"lineNumber":263719,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle start."},{"lineNumber":263720,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦っている最中に魔物軍が乱入","translatedEnglishLine":"During the fight, the monster army interrupts."},{"lineNumber":263721,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t決着はつける事が出来ずにうやむやになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Could not reach a conclusion; the outcome remains unclear."},{"lineNumber":263722,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍の状況","translatedEnglishLine":"Status of the demon army."},{"lineNumber":263723,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ワーグが無理矢理参戦させられた","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Warg was forcibly made to join the battle."},{"lineNumber":263724,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ワーグが活動している","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Warg is active."},{"lineNumber":263725,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人類軍のいくつかの砦は陥落した","translatedEnglishLine":"Several of the human army's forts have fallen."},{"lineNumber":263726,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸＸＸＸにランス達が到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others have arrived at XXXXX."},{"lineNumber":263727,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況報告、眠ったままの部隊の話","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle status report, about the troops still asleep."},{"lineNumber":263728,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＩＦにて　リーザス、ヘルマン、ゼス、自由都市　を分ける","translatedEnglishLine":"In an IF scenario, dividing Rizas, Herman, Zeth, and the free city."},{"lineNumber":263729,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラがワーグの説明をする","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella explains about Warg."},{"lineNumber":263730,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tワーグの能力、派閥戦争の時、非常に危険な存在である事","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg's abilities; he was a very dangerous entity during the faction wars."},{"lineNumber":263731,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t最近、この辺りで魔人ワーグの被害が出たのだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Recently, there have been damages caused by demon Warg around here."},{"lineNumber":263732,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの付近の２つの砦が集団睡眠になっています","translatedEnglishLine":"Two forts near here are in a state of collective sleep."},{"lineNumber":263733,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、俺様がワーグちゃんを捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I will catch Warg-chan."},{"lineNumber":263734,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやめた方がいいと誰かが言うが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says I should not do it..."},{"lineNumber":263735,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tワーグちゃんに眠らされてエッチないたずらをされたらどうしよう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What if Warg-chan puts me to sleep and does naughty pranks on me..."},{"lineNumber":263736,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺は眠っている子にエッチをするのは好きだが、されるのは好きではない","translatedEnglishLine":"I like doing naughty things to sleeping girls, but don't like being on the receiving end."},{"lineNumber":263737,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなどいいつつ、戦場に出かけます","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying that, he heads out to the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":263738,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞以降、戦闘しながら少し進む","translatedEnglishLine":"> From here on, advance a bit while fighting."},{"lineNumber":263739,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２００人近くの兵士がいる砦だが、みんな眠っている","translatedEnglishLine":"The fort has nearly 200 soldiers, but all are asleep."},{"lineNumber":263740,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t眠っていて生きているのがたちが悪い、ほっておくと衰弱して死ぬので","translatedEnglishLine":"Their being alive while asleep is troublesome; if left alone they will weaken and die."},{"lineNumber":263741,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t介抱する必要があり、それがまた軍の余計な手間になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They need care, which becomes an additional burden for the army."},{"lineNumber":263742,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t起きている少年兵がいる、彼は最初からこの砦にいたのが眠っていない","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a boy soldier awake; he was here from the start and is not asleep."},{"lineNumber":263743,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどうしてかというと、集団催眠にかけられた時、彼は休憩で寝ていたらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"Because when the group hypnosis was cast, he was apparently resting and asleep."},{"lineNumber":263744,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tワーグに直接眠らされたので無いので大丈夫だったという状況","translatedEnglishLine":"Since he wasn't put to sleep directly by Warg, he is fine."},{"lineNumber":263745,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t寝ている兵士が集められている部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"A room where the sleeping soldiers are gathered."},{"lineNumber":263746,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t若い女性兵士ばかりの部屋もある","translatedEnglishLine":"There is also a room with only young female soldiers."},{"lineNumber":263747,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t眠り姫だな・・とキスする、当然起きない","translatedEnglishLine":"'Sleeping beauty,' he says and kisses her; of course she doesn't wake."},{"lineNumber":263748,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t誰かが注意するがランスは聞かない","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone warns him, but Rance ignores it."},{"lineNumber":263749,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれどころか、そうだ、あれを試そう。","translatedEnglishLine":"On the contrary, he says, 'Right, I’ll try that.'"},{"lineNumber":263750,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t英雄である俺様の精液を注ぎ込まれたら奇蹟の力で目をさますかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"If they are poured with my semen, as a hero, they might awaken by miraculous power."},{"lineNumber":263751,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t過去に寝ている女にやった時は途中で起きたぞ。パステルとか","translatedEnglishLine":"When I did it to sleeping girls in the past, they woke up halfway, like Pastel."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者が撤退を決めて逃げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholar decided to retreat and fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間を大切した戦いをする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fought while cherishing comrades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔物を人質に卑怯作戦をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance uses monsters as hostages in a sneaky tactic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊は撤退していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しく加わったアパッチがみんなと不仲
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recently joined Apache is not on good terms with everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが卑怯な毒煙作戦をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance executes a sneaky poisonous smoke tactic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊は撤退していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らの中に少し不協和音
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some discord among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣豪、アパッチが裏切りランス側に付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swordmaster Apache betrays and sides with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が撤退していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣豪、アパッチが復帰した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swordmaster Apache has rejoined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘をしようとした時、地面が陥没して迷宮に遭難
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When about to fight, the ground caved in and they got lost in a labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時休戦で一緒に行動
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Temporary ceasefire, moving together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハチ女の集団と遭遇、共闘となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encountered a group of bee women; they form an alliance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊と魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad and the demon extermination squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に戻れた、今日は戦わずに別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Returned to the surface, parted ways without fighting today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ決着を付けたい全力でいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They want to settle it soon, going all out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中に魔物軍が乱入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the fight, the monster army interrupts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決着はつける事が出来ずにうやむやになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could not reach a conclusion; the outcome remains unclear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Status of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ワーグが無理矢理参戦させられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Warg was forcibly made to join the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ワーグが活動している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Warg is active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍のいくつかの砦は陥落した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several of the human army's forts have fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸＸＸにランス達が到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have arrived at XXXXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況報告、眠ったままの部隊の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle status report, about the troops still asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦにて　リーザス、ヘルマン、ゼス、自由都市　を分ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In an IF scenario, dividing Rizas, Herman, Zeth, and the free city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがワーグの説明をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella explains about Warg.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグの能力、派閥戦争の時、非常に危険な存在である事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg's abilities; he was a very dangerous entity during the faction wars.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、この辺りで魔人ワーグの被害が出たのだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recently, there have been damages caused by demon Warg around here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この付近の２つの砦が集団睡眠になっています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two forts near here are in a state of collective sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺様がワーグちゃんを捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I will catch Warg-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめた方がいいと誰かが言うが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says I should not do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグちゃんに眠らされてエッチないたずらをされたらどうしよう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What if Warg-chan puts me to sleep and does naughty pranks on me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は眠っている子にエッチをするのは好きだが、されるのは好きではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like doing naughty things to sleeping girls, but don't like being on the receiving end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などいいつつ、戦場に出かけます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, he heads out to the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞以降、戦闘しながら少し進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > From here on, advance a bit while fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２００人近くの兵士がいる砦だが、みんな眠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fort has nearly 200 soldiers, but all are asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠っていて生きているのがたちが悪い、ほっておくと衰弱して死ぬので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their being alive while asleep is troublesome; if left alone they will weaken and die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 介抱する必要があり、それがまた軍の余計な手間になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They need care, which becomes an additional burden for the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起きている少年兵がいる、彼は最初からこの砦にいたのが眠っていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a boy soldier awake; he was here from the start and is not asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてかというと、集団催眠にかけられた時、彼は休憩で寝ていたらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because when the group hypnosis was cast, he was apparently resting and asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグに直接眠らされたので無いので大丈夫だったという状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since he wasn't put to sleep directly by Warg, he is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている兵士が集められている部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A room where the sleeping soldiers are gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若い女性兵士ばかりの部屋もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is also a room with only young female soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠り姫だな・・とキスする、当然起きない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Sleeping beauty,' he says and kisses her; of course she doesn't wake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが注意するがランスは聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone warns him, but Rance ignores it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころか、そうだ、あれを試そう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the contrary, he says, 'Right, I’ll try that.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 英雄である俺様の精液を注ぎ込まれたら奇蹟の力で目をさますかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they are poured with my semen, as a hero, they might awaken by miraculous power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去に寝ている女にやった時は途中で起きたぞ。パステルとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I did it to sleeping girls in the past, they woke up halfway, like Pastel.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者が撤退を決めて逃げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholar decided to retreat and fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間を大切した戦いをする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fought while cherishing comrades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔物を人質に卑怯作戦をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance uses monsters as hostages in a sneaky tactic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊は撤退していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しく加わったアパッチがみんなと不仲
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recently joined Apache is not on good terms with everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが卑怯な毒煙作戦をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance executes a sneaky poisonous smoke tactic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊は撤退していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らの中に少し不協和音
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some discord among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣豪、アパッチが裏切りランス側に付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swordmaster Apache betrays and sides with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が撤退していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣豪、アパッチが復帰した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swordmaster Apache has rejoined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘をしようとした時、地面が陥没して迷宮に遭難
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When about to fight, the ground caved in and they got lost in a labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時休戦で一緒に行動
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Temporary ceasefire, moving together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハチ女の集団と遭遇、共闘となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encountered a group of bee women; they form an alliance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊と魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad and the demon extermination squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に戻れた、今日は戦わずに別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Returned to the surface, parted ways without fighting today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ決着を付けたい全力でいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They want to settle it soon, going all out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中に魔物軍が乱入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the fight, the monster army interrupts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決着はつける事が出来ずにうやむやになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could not reach a conclusion; the outcome remains unclear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Status of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ワーグが無理矢理参戦させられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Warg was forcibly made to join the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ワーグが活動している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Warg is active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍のいくつかの砦は陥落した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several of the human army's forts have fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸＸＸにランス達が到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have arrived at XXXXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況報告、眠ったままの部隊の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle status report, about the troops still asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦにて　リーザス、ヘルマン、ゼス、自由都市　を分ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In an IF scenario, dividing Rizas, Herman, Zeth, and the free city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがワーグの説明をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella explains about Warg.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグの能力、派閥戦争の時、非常に危険な存在である事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg's abilities; he was a very dangerous entity during the faction wars.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、この辺りで魔人ワーグの被害が出たのだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recently, there have been damages caused by demon Warg around here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この付近の２つの砦が集団睡眠になっています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two forts near here are in a state of collective sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺様がワーグちゃんを捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I will catch Warg-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめた方がいいと誰かが言うが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says I should not do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグちゃんに眠らされてエッチないたずらをされたらどうしよう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What if Warg-chan puts me to sleep and does naughty pranks on me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は眠っている子にエッチをするのは好きだが、されるのは好きではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like doing naughty things to sleeping girls, but don't like being on the receiving end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などいいつつ、戦場に出かけます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, he heads out to the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞以降、戦闘しながら少し進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > From here on, advance a bit while fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２００人近くの兵士がいる砦だが、みんな眠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fort has nearly 200 soldiers, but all are asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠っていて生きているのがたちが悪い、ほっておくと衰弱して死ぬので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their being alive while asleep is troublesome; if left alone they will weaken and die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 介抱する必要があり、それがまた軍の余計な手間になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They need care, which becomes an additional burden for the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起きている少年兵がいる、彼は最初からこの砦にいたのが眠っていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a boy soldier awake; he was here from the start and is not asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてかというと、集団催眠にかけられた時、彼は休憩で寝ていたらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because when the group hypnosis was cast, he was apparently resting and asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグに直接眠らされたので無いので大丈夫だったという状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since he wasn't put to sleep directly by Warg, he is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている兵士が集められている部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A room where the sleeping soldiers are gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若い女性兵士ばかりの部屋もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is also a room with only young female soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠り姫だな・・とキスする、当然起きない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Sleeping beauty,' he says and kisses her; of course she doesn't wake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが注意するがランスは聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone warns him, but Rance ignores it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころか、そうだ、あれを試そう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the contrary, he says, 'Right, I’ll try that.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 英雄である俺様の精液を注ぎ込まれたら奇蹟の力で目をさますかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they are poured with my semen, as a hero, they might awaken by miraculous power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去に寝ている女にやった時は途中で起きたぞ。パステルとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I did it to sleeping girls in the past, they woke up halfway, like Pastel.
